I therefore urge again the Gbagbo camp to fully respect the will of the Ivorian people, Ban Ki-moon told journalists on the sidelines of the World Economic Forum in Davos. Michael Gove criticised the current guidelines on history teaching for failing to include key figures from British history. No Churchill, no Elizabeth II , no Gladstone, no Disraeli, no Florence Nightingale, no Horatio Nelson, he wrote.
